SELECT A.BOARD_NUM, A.FK_USERID, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.WRITE_DATE, A.VIEWS, A.OPEN, NVL(B.COMMENT_CNT, 0) AS COMMENT_CNT FROM (SELECT BOARD_NUM, FK_USERID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE, VIEWS, OPEN FROM TBL_BOARD
WHERE DEL = 'N' AND ((FK_USERID = #{fkUserid} AND OPEN = 'N') OR OPEN = 'Y')) A
WHERE DEL = 'N' AND FK_USERID = #{fkUserid}) A
LEFT JOIN (SELECT FK_BOARD_NUM, COUNT(COMMENT_NUM) AS COMMENT_CNT FROM TBL_COMMENT GROUP BY FK_BOARD_NUM) B ON A.BOARD_NUM = B.FK_BOARD_NUM;
SELECT BOARD_NUM, FK_USERID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE, VIEWS FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum} AND DEL = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD (BOARD_NUM, FK_USERID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE, VIEWS, DEL) VALUES (nextval(seq_boardNum), 'limsw', #{title}, #{content}, default, default, 'N')
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET DEL = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET VIEWS = (VIEWS+1) WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
